#BREAKING: Sources tell @globalnewsto the gov't will announce the "Ontario #COVID19 Worker Protection Benefit Program" at 3:15pm...3 paid sick days for FT and PT positions, administered by WSIB. Gov't will reimburse 100%. Cost will be $750M-1.5B, Program to end Sept 25 #ONpoli

1/ A few #COVID19 vaccine updates for Ontario:

The province will receive 250K doses of AstraZeneca this month, likely reserved for 2nd doses.

Also, it is likely that those who received 1st dose of AZ *may* get a 2nd dose of an mRNA vaccine.

(Photography: Jay Kerr @bombippy) https://t.co/7XKoU92MF7

But recent federal modeling suggests health measures may potentially be safely eased once 75% of adults have at least one dose and 20% have two: https://t.co/VR2J5UfrE9

This would require ~30 million doses be administered. We're on pace for that by June 26. https://t.co/72tOQeDcDx

Recent federal modeling suggests health measures may potentially be safely eased once 75% of adults have at least one dose and 20% have two: https://t.co/VR2J5Ux2vH

This would require ~30 million doses be administered. We're on pace for that by June 28. https://t.co/sGdWZ3NKT7

But recent federal modeling suggests health measures may potentially be safely eased once 75% of adults have at least one dose and 20% have two: https://t.co/VR2J5UfrE9

This would require ~30 million doses be administered. We're on pace for that by June 24. https://t.co/m43e9qg5m3

But recent federal modeling suggests health measures may potentially be safely eased once 75% of adults have at least one dose and 20% have two: https://t.co/VR2J5UfrE9

This would require ~30 million doses be administered. We're on pace for that by June 30. https://t.co/hn0Qz07wU0

After 14 months of #COVID19, we were promised "the best #PaidSickDays program in North America.”

Instead we got a program which provides 3 days of pay for an illness which requires isolation for a minimum of 10 days.

Never underestimate the inhumanity of the Ontario government.
